name: ShoutOut Radio
overview:
ShoutOut Radio lets you send, receive and listen to music with your Facebook friends. Think of it as your personal radio station where you can dedicate a song to a select few or send your favorite songs as a ShoutOut to all.

If music reminds you of someone, an event or a funny memory, then you’ll love ShoutOut Radio. Express your love of music and those special music moments by sending and receiving “ShoutOuts” with your friends.

Since it already works with Facebook, you can start listening to new songs, hearing the ones you’ve forgotten and posting your comments. This app stands at the intersection of radio dedication and music discovery. It’s what ShoutOut Radio is all about.
